meanings.sent1: After washing the car, it looked even soapier than before.
meanings.sent2: The soapier hands felt slippery and clean.
meanings.sent3: The soapier floor made it easier to slide around in socks.
meanings.sent4: The soapier bubbles in the bath seemed to dance with joy.
meanings.sent5: The soapier dishes sparkled under the bright kitchen lights.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of soap
meanings.sent1: The soapier scent of the flowers reminded her of a fresh laundry day.
meanings.sent2: Her hair felt softer and soapier after using the new shampoo.
meanings.sent3: The soapier texture of the cake made it melt in her mouth.
meanings.sent4: The soapier appearance of the clouds signaled an incoming rainstorm.
meanings.sent5: The soapier touch of the fabric made it feel luxurious against her skin.
